quote: This is what I want. This is the only thing I've ever wanted. Everything else—every single second of every single day that has come before this very moment, this kiss—has meant nothing.
quote_letters: THIS IS WHAT I WANT THIS IS THE ONLY THING IVE EVER WANTED EVERYTHING ELSE-EVERY SINGLE SECOND OF EVERY SINGLE DAY THAT HAS COME BEFORE THIS VERY MOMENT THIS KISS-HAS MEANT NOTHING
